actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide survivors' annuities under chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code to the surviving spouses of annuitants who were unmarried at the time of retiring but who later remarried and died before January 8, 1971.

summary.text: Provides a survivor's annuity to the surviving spouse of a civil service annuitant who married such spouse after retirement and died before January 8, 1971.

titles.title: A bill to provide survivors' annuities under chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code to the surviving spouses of annuitants who were unmarried at the time of retiring but who later remarried and died before January 8, 1971.
